title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
description: An intelligent system that automatically reviews code and provides suggestions for improvements using machine learning.
fullDescription: This project leverages advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze code quality, detect potential bugs, and suggest improvements. It integrates seamlessly with popular version control systems and provides real-time feedback to developers.

title: Smart Campus Navigation System
description: IoT-based indoor navigation system for university campuses with real-time location tracking.
fullDescription: An innovative IoT solution that helps students and visitors navigate complex campus buildings. Uses beacon technology and smartphone sensors to provide turn-by-turn indoor navigation with accessibility features.

title: E-Commerce Platform with AR
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform featuring augmented reality product visualization.
fullDescription: A modern e-commerce solution that allows customers to visualize products in their space using AR technology. Includes payment processing, inventory management, and a responsive admin dashboard.

title: Healthcare Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for analyzing patient data and predicting health trends.
fullDescription: A comprehensive analytics platform that helps healthcare providers make data-driven decisions. Features predictive modeling, patient risk assessment, and interactive visualizations of health trends.

title: Blockchain-Based Voting System
description: Secure and transparent voting system using blockchain technology.
fullDescription: A decentralized voting application that ensures transparency and security through blockchain technology. Prevents fraud and allows for verifiable, anonymous voting with real-time results.

title: Real-Time Collaboration Whiteboard
description: Web-based collaborative whiteboard with real-time synchronization.
fullDescription: An interactive whiteboard application that enables teams to collaborate in real-time. Features include drawing tools, text annotations, image uploads, and session recording capabilities.
